snippet: In making his first public comments after breaking Smith’s jaw in an altercation in the Jets’ locker room, Enemkpali referred only to something that “happened,” spoke for just 45 seconds and declined to take any questions.
abstract: NFL Roundup; former New York Jets linebacker Ikemefuna Enemkpali apologizes for assault on quarterback Geno Smith and expresses gratitude to his new team Buffalo Bills; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: In making his first public comments after breaking Smith’s jaw in an altercation in the Jets’ locker room, Enemkpali referred only to something that “happened,” spoke for just 45 seconds and declined to take any questions.

headline.main: Ex-Jet Says He’s Sorry Without Being Specific About Geno Smith
